hints.label: def-qsd-adaptive
hints.title: Quasi-Stationary Distribution (QSD)
hints.content:
326: :label: def-qsd-adaptive
327: 
328: A probability measure $\pi_N$ on $\Sigma_N$ is a **quasi-stationary distribution** for the Geometric Gas if:
329: 
330: 1. **Invariance:** $\mathcal{L}^* \pi_N = 0$ (where $\mathcal{L}^*$ is the adjoint in $L^2(\Sigma_N, \text{vol})$)
331: 2. **Ergodicity:** $\pi_N$ is the unique such invariant measure
hints.raw_directive:
323: ### 3.3. The Quasi-Stationary Distribution (QSD)
324: 
325: :::{prf:definition} Quasi-Stationary Distribution (QSD)
326: :label: def-qsd-adaptive
327: 
328: A probability measure $\pi_N$ on $\Sigma_N$ is a **quasi-stationary distribution** for the Geometric Gas if:
329: 
330: 1. **Invariance:** $\mathcal{L}^* \pi_N = 0$ (where $\mathcal{L}^*$ is the adjoint in $L^2(\Sigma_N, \text{vol})$)
331: 2. **Ergodicity:** $\pi_N$ is the unique such invariant measure
332: 3. **Attraction:** For any initial $\mu_0 \in \mathcal{P}(\Sigma_N)$, $\mu_t \to \pi_N$ as $t \to \infty$

hints.label: def-lsi-adaptive
hints.title: Log-Sobolev Inequality
hints.content:
347: :label: def-lsi-adaptive
348: 
349: A probability measure $\mu$ on $\Sigma_N$ satisfies a **Log-Sobolev Inequality** with constant $C_{\text{LSI}} > 0$ if, for all smooth $f: \Sigma_N \to \mathbb{R}_+$ with $\int f^2 d\mu = 1$:
350: 
351: $$
352: \text{Ent}_\mu(f^2) \leq C_{\text{LSI}} \int \Gamma_{\Sigma_{\text{reg}}}(f, f) \, d\mu
353: $$
354: 
355: where:
356: - **Entropy functional:** $\text{Ent}_\mu(f^2) := \int f^2 \log(f^2) d\mu$
hints.raw_directive:
344: ### 3.4. Log-Sobolev Inequality (LSI)
345: 
346: :::{prf:definition} Log-Sobolev Inequality
347: :label: def-lsi-adaptive
348: 
349: A probability measure $\mu$ on $\Sigma_N$ satisfies a **Log-Sobolev Inequality** with constant $C_{\text{LSI}} > 0$ if, for all smooth $f: \Sigma_N \to \mathbb{R}_+$ with $\int f^2 d\mu = 1$:
350: 
351: $$
352: \text{Ent}_\mu(f^2) \leq C_{\text{LSI}} \int \Gamma_{\Sigma_{\text{reg}}}(f, f) \, d\mu
353: $$
354: 
355: where:
356: - **Entropy functional:** $\text{Ent}_\mu(f^2) := \int f^2 \log(f^2) d\mu$
357: - **Carré du champ operator:** $\Gamma_{\Sigma_{\text{reg}}}(f, f) := \frac{1}{2} \sum_{i=1}^N \|\Sigma_{\text{reg}}(x_i, S) \nabla_{v_i} f\|^2$
